verses.text: Now the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* \add were\add*, \w Tola|strong="H8439"\w*, and \w Puah|strong="H6312"\w*, \w Jashub|strong="H3437"\w*, and \w Shimron|strong="H8110"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Tola|strong="H8439"\w*; \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w*, and \w Rephaiah|strong="H7509"\w*, and \w Jeriel|strong="H3400"\w*, and \w Jahmai|strong="H3181"\w*, and \w Jibsam|strong="H3005"\w*, and \w Shemuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of their \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \add to wit\add*, of \w Tola|strong="H8439"\w*: \add they were\add* valiant \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w might|strong="H2428"\w* in their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*; whose \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \add was\add* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w*; \w Izrahiah|strong="H3156"\w*: and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Izrahiah|strong="H3156"\w*; \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w*, and \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, and \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w*, \w Ishiah|strong="H3449"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w*: all of them chief \w men|strong="H7218"\w*.

And with them, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \add were\add* \w bands|strong="H1416"\w* of \w soldiers|strong="H6635"\w* for \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add men:\add* for they had \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* and \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

And their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* among all the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* \add were\add* \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w* men of \w might|strong="H2428"\w*, reckoned in all by their \w genealogies|strong="H3187"\w* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.
¶ \add The sons\add* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*; \w Bela|strong="H1106"\w*, and \w Becher|strong="H1071"\w*, and \w Jediael|strong="H3043"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bela|strong="H1106"\w*; \w Ezbon|strong="H0675"\w*, and \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w*, and \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*, and \w Jerimoth|strong="H3406"\w*, and \w Iri|strong="H5901"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w*; \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \add their\add* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* men of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*; and were reckoned by their \w genealogies|strong="H3187"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Becher|strong="H1071"\w*; \w Zemira|strong="H2160"\w*, and \w Joash|strong="H3135"\w*, and \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w*, and \w Elioenai|strong="H0454"\w*, and \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w*, and \w Jerimoth|strong="H3406"\w*, and \w Abiah|strong="H0029"\w*, and \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, and \w Alameth|strong="H5964"\w*. All these \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Becher|strong="H1071"\w*.

And the \w number|strong="H3187"\w* of them, after their genealogy by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* also of \w Jediael|strong="H3043"\w*; \w Bilhan|strong="H1092"\w*: and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bilhan|strong="H1092"\w*; \w Jeush|strong="H3274"\w*, and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and \w Ehud|strong="H0164"\w*, and \w Chenaanah|strong="H3668"\w*, and \w Zethan|strong="H2133"\w*, and \w Tharshish|strong="H8659"\w*, and \w Ahishahar|strong="H0300"\w*.

All these the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jediael|strong="H3043"\w*, by the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* men of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, \add were\add* \w seventeen|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add soldiers\add*, fit to go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* for \w war|strong="H6635"\w* \add and\add* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w Shuppim|strong="H8206"\w* also, and \w Huppim|strong="H2650"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ir|strong="H5893"\w*, \add and\add* \w Hushim|strong="H2366"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aher|strong="H0313"\w*.\f + \fr 7.12 \ft Ir: or, Iri\f*\f + \fr 7.12 \ft Aher: or, Ahiram\f*

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*; \w Jahziel|strong="H3185"\w*, and \w Guni|strong="H1476"\w*, and \w Jezer|strong="H3337"\w*, and \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bilhah|strong="H1090"\w*.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*; \w Ashriel|strong="H0844"\w*, whom she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w*: (\add but\add* his \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w* the \w Aramitess|strong="H0761"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*:

And \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \add the sister\add* of \w Huppim|strong="H2650"\w* and \w Shuppim|strong="H8206"\w*, whose \w sister’s|strong="H0269"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Maachah|strong="H4601"\w*;) and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \add was\add* \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w*: and \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w* had \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.

And \w Maachah|strong="H4601"\w* the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and she \w called|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Peresh|strong="H6570"\w*; and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \add was\add* \w Sheresh|strong="H8329"\w*; and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \add were\add* \w Ulam|strong="H0198"\w* and \w Rakem|strong="H7552"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ulam|strong="H0198"\w*; \w Bedan|strong="H0917"\w*. These \add were\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.
And his \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w Hammoleketh|strong="H4447"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w Ishod|strong="H0379"\w*, and \w Abiezer|strong="H0044"\w*, and \w Mahalah|strong="H4244"\w*.
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shemida|strong="H8061"\w* were, \w Ahian|strong="H0291"\w*, and \w Shechem|strong="H7928"\w*, and \w Likhi|strong="H3949"\w*, and \w Aniam|strong="H0593"\w*.

¶ And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*; \w Shuthelah|strong="H7803"\w*, and \w Bered|strong="H1260"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Tahath|strong="H8480"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Eladah|strong="H0497"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Tahath|strong="H8480"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

¶ And \w Zabad|strong="H2066"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Shuthelah|strong="H7803"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Ezer|strong="H5827"\w*, and \w Elead|strong="H0496"\w*, whom the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w* \add that were\add* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* in \add that\add* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w*, because they came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* their \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*.

And \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* their \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w mourned|strong="H0056"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* him.

¶ And when he went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, and \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Beriah|strong="H1283"\w*, because it went \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* with his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

(And his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \add was\add* \w Sherah|strong="H7609"\w*, who \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w* the \w nether|strong="H8481"\w*, and the \w upper|strong="H5945"\w*, and \w Uzzen-sherah|strong="H0242"\w*.)

And \w Rephah|strong="H7506"\w* \add was\add* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, also \w Resheph|strong="H7566"\w*, and \w Telah|strong="H8520"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Tahan|strong="H8465"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
\w Laadan|strong="H3936"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Ammihud|strong="H5989"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
\w Non|strong="H5126"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Jehoshua|strong="H3091"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 7.27 \ft Non: or, Nun\f*\f + \fr 7.27 \ft Jehoshua: or, Joshua\f*

¶ And their \w possessions|strong="H0272"\w* and \w habitations|strong="H4186"\w* \add were\add*, \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* and the \w towns|strong="H1323"\w* thereof, and \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w* \w Naaran|strong="H5295"\w*, and \w westward|strong="H4628"\w* \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w*, with the \w towns|strong="H1323"\w* thereof; \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* also and the \w towns|strong="H1323"\w* thereof, unto \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w* and the \w towns|strong="H1323"\w* thereof:\f + \fr 7.28 \ft towns: Heb. daughters\f*\f + \fr 7.28 \ft unto Gaza: or, Adassa\f*

And by the \w borders|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w Beth-shean|strong="H1052"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, \w Taanach|strong="H8590"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, \w Dor|strong="H1756"\w* and her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*. In these \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 7.29 \ft towns: Heb. daughters\f*

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*; \w Imnah|strong="H3232"\w*, and \w Isuah|strong="H3438"\w*, and \w Ishuai|strong="H3440"\w*, and \w Beriah|strong="H1283"\w*, and \w Serah|strong="H8294"\w* their \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Beriah|strong="H1283"\w*; \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w*, and \w Malchiel|strong="H4439"\w*, who \add is\add* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Birzavith|strong="H1269"\w*.

And \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Japhlet|strong="H3310"\w*, and \w Shomer|strong="H7763"\w*, and \w Hotham|strong="H2369"\w*, and \w Shua|strong="H7774"\w* their \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Japhlet|strong="H3310"\w*; \w Pasach|strong="H6457"\w*, and \w Bimhal|strong="H1118"\w*, and \w Ashvath|strong="H6220"\w*. These \add are\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Japhlet|strong="H3310"\w*.
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shamer|strong="H8106"\w*; \w Ahi|strong="H0277"\w*, and \w Rohgah|strong="H7303"\w*, \w Jehubbah|strong="H3160"\w*, and \w Aram|strong="H0758"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w Helem|strong="H1987"\w*; \w Zophah|strong="H6690"\w*, and \w Imna|strong="H3234"\w*, and \w Shelesh|strong="H8028"\w*, and \w Amal|strong="H6000"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zophah|strong="H6690"\w*; \w Suah|strong="H5477"\w*, and \w Harnepher|strong="H2774"\w*, and \w Shual|strong="H7777"\w*, and \w Beri|strong="H1275"\w*, and \w Imrah|strong="H3236"\w*,
\w Bezer|strong="H1221"\w*, and \w Hod|strong="H1936"\w*, and \w Shamma|strong="H8037"\w*, and \w Shilshah|strong="H8030"\w*, and \w Ithran|strong="H3506"\w*, and \w Beera|strong="H0878"\w*.
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jether|strong="H3500"\w*; \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w*, and \w Pispah|strong="H6462"\w*, and \w Ara|strong="H0690"\w*.
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ulla|strong="H5925"\w*; \w Arah|strong="H0733"\w*, and \w Haniel|strong="H2592"\w*, and \w Rezia|strong="H7525"\w*.

All these \add were\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of \add their\add* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w choice|strong="H1305"\w* \add and\add* mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w*. And the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* throughout the \w genealogy|strong="H3187"\w* of them that were apt to the \w war|strong="H6635"\w* \add and\add* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*.
